name: Chaos Knight
title: Nessaj
lore: The oldest Fundamental, Chaos Knight rides forth to bring the ultimate discord across all planes of existence.

chaosBolt.name: Chaos Bolt
chaosBolt.description: Throws a bolt of chaotic energy, dealing random damage and stunning for a random duration.

realityRift.name: Reality Rift
realityRift.description: Teleports Chaos Knight and his illusions to a target, reducing their armor.

chaosStrike.name: Chaos Strike
chaosStrike.description: Each attack has a chance to deal critical damage and steal HP from the target.

phantasm.name: Phantasm
phantasm.description: Creates illusions of Chaos Knight that deal significant damage.
